ChemoSpec ğŸŸ  â¡ï¸ ğŸ”µ hyperSpec

Source: R/to_hyperSpec.R
ChemoSpec_to_hyperSpec.Rd

ChemoSpec ğŸŸ  â¡ï¸ ğŸ”µ hyperSpec

Usage

ChemoSpec_to_hyperSpec(Spectra, ...)

Arguments

Spectra

ChemoSpec::Spectra() object.

...

Arguments passed on to hyperSpec::new_hyperSpec

gc

(logical)
Use garbage collection. If option gc is TRUE, the initialization will have frequent calls to base::gc(), which can help to avoid swapping or running out of memory. The default value of gc can be set via hy_set_options().

Value

A hyperSpec::hyperSpec object.

See also

to_hyperSpec(), hyperSpec_to_ChemoSpec()

Examples

suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(ChemoSpec))
data("alignMUD")
ChemoSpec_to_hyperSpec(alignMUD) |> str()
